description:
*pdfarranger* is a small python-gtk application, which helps the user to merge or split pdf documents and rotate, crop and rearrange their pages using an interactive and intuitive graphical interface. It is a frontend for [pikepdf](https://github.com/pikepdf/pikepdf).
    
    *pdfarranger* is a fork of Konstantinos Poulios's pdfshuffler (see [Savannah](https://savannah.nongnu.org/projects/pdfshuffler) or [Sourceforge](http://sourceforge.net/projects/pdfshuffler)). It’s a humble attempt to make the project a bit more active.
author: PDF-Arranger developer team
